channel.title: Jenny Stafford on Bloomington Playwrights Project
channel.description: Recent content in Jenny Stafford on Bloomington Playwrights Project

item.title: Beating A Dead Horse
item.description: Brothers Steve and Marty Martin are on the brink of closing their failing pet funeral home, until an eccentric (and rich) new customer comes in with an amazing proposition: plan a funeral for her nearly dead racehorse, and she’ll give the boys a fortune to keep their business afloat. The only problem? The horse won’t die. With everything on the line, the two embark on a hysterical journey to see how far they’ll go to make their dreams come true, in this laugh-a-minute screwball comedy.
